task.summary: Default task
Initial commit.
Initial commit.

Changed comments to properly reflect objectives for this ADALINE (previously labeled a perceptron). Reoriented some of the data sets to provide some overlap between classes (to demonstrate misclassifications). Corrected target labels so that they are {+1,-1}. Changed the figure sizes and added proper titles to subplots. Produced a text plot with class labels and color highlighed misclassifications.

Changed comments to properly reflect objectives for this ADALINE (previously labeled a perceptron). Reoriented some of the data sets to provide some overlap between classes (to demonstrate misclassifications). Corrected target labels so that they are {+1,-1}. Changed the figure sizes and added proper titles to subplots. Produced a text plot with class labels and color highlighed misclassifications.

Changed comments to properly reflect objectives for this ADALINE (previously labeled a perceptron). Reoriented some of the data sets to provide some overlap between classes (to demonstrate misclassifications). Corrected target labels so that they are {+1,-1}. Changed the figure sizes and added proper titles to subplots. Produced a text plot with class labels and color highlighted misclassifications.

Changed comments to properly reflect objectives for this ADALINE (previously labeled a perceptron). Reoriented some of the data sets to provide some overlap between classes (to demonstrate misclassifications). Corrected target labels so that they are {+1,-1}. Changed the figure sizes and added proper titles to subplots. Produced a text plot with class labels and color highlighted misclassification.

Changed comments to properly reflect objectives for this ADALINE (previously labeled a perceptron). Reoriented some of the data sets to provide some overlap between classes (to demonstrate misclassifications). Corrected target labels so that they are {+1,-1}. Changed the figure sizes and added proper titles to subplots. Produced a text plot with class labels and color highlighted misclassification.

Modified comments adding more detail and providing a (text-based) diagram of the noise cancellation system. PyCharm comment regions were added so that they closely resemble the stated objectives. Made changes to the readme.md file to show descriptions of Lab 4 exercises as well as their objectives.

Fixed The description in the wording for Lab 4, Ex3 and added new objectives including the addition of a custom classifier that makes use of weights and bias extracted from a scikit's perceptron trained on the Sonar data set. Training accuracy is assesed for the custom and scikit's perceptron using the same weights. An objective was also added to export these comparisons to an Excel file. Made many modifications to the root README.md file: Added titles for the labs already done, and inserted lab titles to be done for planning purposes.

Fixed The description in the wording for Lab 4, Ex3 and added new objectives including the addition of a custom classifier that makes use of weights and bias extracted from a scikit's perceptron trained on the Sonar data set. Training accuracy is assesed for the custom and scikit's perceptron using the same weights. An objective was also added to export these comparisons to an Excel file. Made many modifications to the root README.md file: Added titles for the labs already done, and inserted lab titles to be done for planning purposes. Completed Labs have checkmarks and uncompleted ones do not.
Checkmarks removed and formatting changes to README.md.
Added spaces in formatting because README.md does not render correctly any more.
Added much more information about the repository to the README.md file.
Added much more information about the repository to the README.md file.
Corrected a typo preventing a heading to appear.
Corrected spacing that prevented a linebreak in README.md.
Removed unnecessary import.
Added Perceptron examples (major update). Updated the README.md file.
Moved files around and renamed some. Added an additional exercise with an arbitrarily large layer of adaline units.
Code cleanup.
Moved files around. General housekeeping.
